trans-unit.source: Represents access to generic isolated storage capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 代表泛型隔離儲存區功能的存取。

trans-unit.source: This class is an abstract base class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is never instantiated; instead, classes that extend it and represent access to a particular type of isolated storage are used.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別永遠不會具現化;相反地，使用類別加以擴充，可存取特定類型的隔離儲存區。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission"></xref> class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStoragePermission"></xref>類別所述的限制或無限制的權限。

trans-unit.source: Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 會建立完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`存取隔離儲存區。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The state parameter is not a valid value of .
trans-unit.target: state 參數不是有效的值 。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的權限。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構權限。

trans-unit.source: The esd parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The esd parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The esd parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: esd 參數不是有效的權限項目。

trans-unit.source: -or- The esd parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: -或- esd 參數的版本號碼不正確。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前權限不受限制;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 權限，包括任何狀態資訊的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of isolated storage containment allowed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許的隔離儲存區內含項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.IsolatedStorageContainment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the quota on the overall size of each user's total store.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每個使用者的總儲存的整體大小配額。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the resource allocated to the user.
trans-unit.target: 大小，以位元組為單位配置給使用者的資源。
